EmailTemplate.name: EN_Covid Store Closure
EmailTemplate.subject: Our store will be temporarily closed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
Most importantly, I hope you and your loved ones are well.
Since the beginning of this crisis, the well-being of our global network of travellers, teammates and customers has been our top priority.
To ensure our collective safety and align with our government's guidelines, our RIMOWA store {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} will be closed until further notice.
In the meantime, I remain at your disposal on this ***phone/email*** and be delighted to answer any questions you may have or assist you with an order as well as arrange for your product delivery.
I am looking forward to welcoming you back to our store soon.
Kind Regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
